DMCA Notice

Smartika Store respects the intellectual property of others, and we ask users of our Web Site to do the same. In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) and other applicable law, we have adopted a policy of terminating, in appropriate circumstances and at our sole discretion, subscribers or account holders who are deemed to be repeat infringers. We may also at our sole discretion limit access to our Web site and/or terminate the accounts of any users who infringe any intellectual property rights owned by this site and rights of other participants, whether or not there is any repeat infringement.

This site is protected by copyright, and all Smartika Store intellectual property (including, but without limitation to trade marks, patents and design rights, photographs and images) and brands included in the material belong to Smartika Store. You may only store on your personal computer or print copies of the material available on these pages for your own personal use and strictly non-commercial use (with the exception only of any permitted use of the Smartika Store Media, for which specific terms and conditions will apply) and you must not adapt, modify or re-use the text or graphics from the site without the prior written consent of Smartika Store.

item.title: Our Certification:
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
SO WHAT MAKES ALL OUR PRODUCTS SAFE TO USE AND WHY DO WE RECOMMEND THEM: The products have the prestigious Kosher Seal (which makes it acceptable to the Jews. The Jews don’t take anything that isn’t 100% natural. In fact, they don’t even take bread with yeast! They believe in no additives completely. All …

Our Certification: Read More »

The post Our Certification: appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
SO WHAT MAKES ALL OUR PRODUCTS SAFE TO USE AND WHY DO WE RECOMMEND THEM:

The products have the prestigious Kosher Seal (which makes it acceptable to the Jews. The Jews don’t take anything that isn’t 100% natural. In fact, they don’t even take bread with yeast! They believe in no additives completely. All our products plus their preservatives are all 100% natural. They have other seals including the Halal and Islamic seals as well. (These are Seals of highest form of purity including our own KEBS in Kenya). All these seals are visible on each of the individual product containers.
 
We are proud members of the Direct Selling Association. To view the Code of Ethics by which we abide, click here. To file a business complaint, email us at storesmartika@gmail.comIf you are unsatisfied with the resolution, you may escalate your complaint to the DSA. Note: Product content, formulations and ingredients, published on this website, are based on U.S laws and regulations, which may vary as actual products sold are in accordance with the importing country’s local laws and regulations.

item.title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions):
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
What Are The Delivery Charges For Orders In Smartika Online Shop? We Offer FREE Delivery For Orders Above Ksh. 7,000. Which Payment Methods Are Accepted In The Online Shop? We Accept Lipa na M-pesa, Airtel Money, Telkom T-Kash, Direct Bank Transfer and Paypal. We’ll Be Adding Visa/Mastercard Payment Soon. How Long Will Delivery Take? Deliveries …

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions): Read More »

The post FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions): appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
What Are The Delivery Charges For Orders In Smartika Online Shop?

We Offer FREE Delivery For Orders Above Ksh. 7,000.

Which Payment Methods Are Accepted In The Online Shop?

We Accept Lipa na M-pesa, Airtel Money, Telkom T-Kash, Direct Bank Transfer and Paypal. We’ll Be Adding Visa/Mastercard Payment Soon.

How Long Will Delivery Take?

Deliveries Within Nairobi Take Between 2 – 4 Hours. Deliveries Outside Nairobi Are Done Via G4S Service. This Takes Upto 24Hours, Standard G4S Delivery Time Frame.

How Secure Is Shopping In The Online Shop? Is My Data Protected?

We Use Let’s Encrypt Security Systems To Protect Our Customers. Your Data Is Safe With Us.

What Exactly Happens After Ordering?

You Will Receive a Call From Us To Confirm The Time and Location of Delivery.

Do I Receive an Invoice For My Order?

Yes, As Soon as You Place an Order, We Will Send You an Invoice To Your Email. It Should Be In Your Inbox Within a Few Seconds.

item.content:encoded:
The statements contained herein are according to the opinion of the authors of this website, based on their personal experience from the daily use of Aloe Vera derived products, other people’s experience and research in books, magazines , the internet and the bodies / organizations involved in the production, manufacture and distribution of these products i.e  
Inclusive of the Direct Selling Association. The statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. The products discussed are not intended to diagnose, mitigate, treat, cure or prevent a specific disease or class of disease. you should consult your family physician if you are experiencing a medical problem or before any final decision on taking or not taking supplements from Smartika Store and/or other. Whilst Smartika Store has used reasonable care and skill in compiling the content of the site, it makes no warranty (express or implied) as to the accuracy or completeness of any information on the site or published by third parties referred to by a link from the site. By accessing this site, you agree that, to the extent permitted by law, Smartika Store shall in no event be liable for any damages whatsoever (including special, indirect or consequential damages), whether in an action of contract or tort, arising out of or in connection with (a) the information on the site or published by third parties referred to by a link from the site, and (b) the performance or non-performance of the site itself.     Go Back To Smartika Store.

item.content:encoded:
The Most Powerful Business Opportunity

  • Free Registration & Membership
  • 60 Seconds Online Application
  • Work Part time or Full time
  • No Hidden Fees & No Autoship Orders
  • Low Investment & Unlimited Earning Potentials

Take the First Step to Begin Your Journey to Financial Freedom!

These Top Distributors all Started with the Combo Pack!

Earning Potentials are Endless with Forever Living!

Choose Any or Choose All! It’s Up to YOU!

  • Retail Profits

    43% retail profit

  • New Distributor Profit

    21% profit on personally sponsored New Distributor purchases

  • Personal Bonus

    5% to 18% on retail sales of personal volume

    • Volume Bonus

    3% to 13% on retail sales of group volume

  • Leadership Bonus

    6%, 3%, 2% on 1st, 2nd and 3rd generation managers

  • Gem Bonus

    Increased earning on downline managers

  • Earned Incentive Bonus/Car Plan

    Up to 800$/month

  • Chairman’s Bonus Payment

    Share in a generous yearly program that pays to build a global business

  • Exotic Vacations

    Earn Trips around the world

One of the greatest sources of illness in the world today is an empty wallet. If you want to decrease the number of stomach problems or the ill-effects of depression, then give a person a chance to earn a living – this is a powerful remedy.

Rex Maughan

– founder of Forever Living Products L.L.C.

Begin Your Journey HERE to Financial Freedom!

item.title: Natural Facial Marine Mask
item.dc:creator: smartikastore
item.description:
-I am sure we all agree that when we look good we feel great. Age spots, fine lines, wrinkles, pigmentation etc. are no good for our self esteem. Add to that constant exposure to toxic elements and the need to take extra care becomes crucial. Also a long day of work or hard day at …

Natural Facial Marine Mask Read More »

The post Natural Facial Marine Mask appeared first on Smartika Shop.
item.content:encoded:
-I am sure we all agree that when we look good we feel great. Age spots, fine lines, wrinkles, pigmentation etc. are no good for our self esteem. Add to that constant exposure to toxic elements and the need to take extra care becomes crucial. Also a long day of work or hard day at play may leave your skin looking and feeling dull and dry. Added moisture and deep cleansing is essential to restore and replenish your skin’s softness and natural texture.

Forever Marine Mask The Right Kind of Mask

Using a high-quality, chemical free and natural facial mask regularly can leave you with brighter, healthier looking skin, by helping remove the debris from the pores and the hair follicles. Face masks have been part of beauty regimen of women since ancient times. Natural products were used to keep the skin supple and smooth. They are ideal when your skin wan and lackluster.

Forever Marine Mask provides deep cleansing while balancing the skin’s texture with natural sea minerals such as sea kelp and algae, plus the super moisturizing and conditioning properties of Aloe Vera, honey and cucumber extract. The synergistic blend of these deep sea minerals help the skin get complete nutrients, and the penetrative properties of Aloe Vera ensures that the nutrients reach to deepest layer of the skin to provide nutrition and moisturization.

Aloe Vera

Not only provides the skin with all the vital nutrients, but also helps in the penetration of nutrients from all the other ingredients.

Sea Kelp

Sea kelp is among the oldest surviving species on Planet Earth. Deep-sea kelp has excellent nutritional qualities. It thrives in a mineral-rich environment – and absorbs an impressive array of these nutrients, including calcium, iron, magnesium, copper, iodine and zinc. Kelp also contains alkali thereby balancing out the acidic effects of environmental exposure to maintain the proper pH balance of the skin. It is known to nourish, oxygenate and detoxify the skin. The exfoliating properties of Kelp make it a great addition to a facial mask. It increases blood circulation and stimulates lymph production to eliminate toxins.

Algae

Algae grows in the most natural way possible. There is no genetic manipulation, fertilizer of pesticides, just the sea, light and the tides. Also, algae’s lack of roots necessitates the absorption of nutritive substances from the sea-water itself.

Some Benefits of Algae on the skin:

  • Encourages vascular constriction to calm flushed and irritated skin
  • Stimulates blood circulation
  • Oxygenates the skin to facilitate toxic elimination
  • Provides a tightening effect
  • Rejuvenates and energizes the skin cells.

Honey

It’s on of nature’s best gifts to rejuvenate and moisturize the skin for a smooth glow. Honey’s ability to absorb and retain moisture helps keep skin hydrated and fresh and prevents drying. It helps to rejuvenate skin and provides glow and softness to skin.

Rosemary Extract

Rosemary is a well-known culinary herb. Applied to the skin, rosemary essential oil helps strengthen the capillaries and has a rejuvenating effect. It has excellent toning and binding effects on loose, sagging skin, while at the same time increasing blood flow, thereby promoting proper skin function. The diuretic attributes help to reduce puffiness and swelling, resulting in firmer skin and better skin tone. It is known to promote a healthy-looking complexion.

Cucumber Extract

Since cucumber has 90% water, it is known to be a cooling agent. As cucumber and the human skin share the same level of hydrogen, it becomes easier for cucumber to mask all the problem areas. The cleaning and cleansing property makes your skin soft and supple. the juice from cucumber has both strong moisturizing abilities as well as mild astringent effects. Cucumber extract is soothing and helps relieve the puffiness of the skin. It also helps remove dead skin cells and tightens skin.

Direction for Use

It is very easy and simple and usually no mixing is required. However at times, mixing in a few drops of Aloe Activator helps create a smooth paste for even application.

After thoroughly cleansing your face, apply an even layer of Forever Marine Mask either with your fingertip or with a brush over the entire face, avoiding the eyes and the eyebrows. For a deeper rejuvenation experience, place the facial fabrique mask (available as a literature item on the aloe store) on the face and apply another coat of Forever Marine Mask over the fabrique. Let dry completely, then gently pull off the entire fabrique in one piece without breaking it. Wash the face with warm water till no residue is left on the skin. Finish by spraying the face with Rehydrating Toner or Sonya Aloe Refreshing Toner. Use twice or thrice a week for optimal results.

Key Points of Forever Marine Mask:

  • Provides deep cleansing and moisturization
  • Contains natural sea minerals
  • Easy-to-apply conditioning mask

Buy Forever Marine Mask with Discount

Would you like to receive discount on your order today? Register now and save 15% instantly. For details please visit here this page: Forever Discounts or register below.

SHOP or JOIN NOW & SAVE 15%-48%!

or
